entry.title: Post editing timeframe
entry.summary: The communication suggests an adjustment to the duration for which content updates are considered, extending it from a 30-day period to a 90-day window. This change implies that if there is a desire to maintain updates beyond this three-month threshold, experimenting with a 'post as wiki' feature could be an alternative approach. The suggestion to convert posts into a wiki format seems to be offered as a solution to facilitate ongoing revisions after the newly proposed 90-day limit for standard updates.
